title: Adam's Mountain Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Slow food restaurant. Menu is around 50%+ vegetarian, and servers are aware of veg diets. No microwave used. Vegans could get the huevos rancheros and substitute eggs with sesame tofu. Has tempeh, white bean sandwich, pancakes, teas, soups, burritos, Senegalese veggies, vegan salads. Some local beer and wine. Romantic setting. Live acoustic music at dinner. 2014 moved from 934 Manitou Ave.
